The original launcher.jar has been modified for use with GIFT. 
To restore launcher.jar to its original state, rebuild the jar
with a new MANIFEST.MF file using the text below the dashed line.
The new manifest file MUST end with a new line.
1/14/2015 - Ticket 1321

======================================================================
